fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Trap someone in an iceberg

> Use an ability you own the copyright to.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Trapping someone in your iceberg roleblocks them, and gives you the copyright to their ability.

> Whenever you use an ability you have a copyright to, you will roleblock the person who originally had the role through any immunities.

> You can’t use the same person’s ability twice in a row

> You can’t trap someone in your iceberg who has already been trapped.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Have the good faction lose the game (you can win while dead).
